initial_question.title: 2. Inference Code 太慢了
initial_question.body: 使用最新readme里面的Inference Code和flux模型。A800显卡需要1h出结果，怎么回事，很慢。原始模型在哪呢。感谢

satisfaction_conditions: Inference processing time is reduced to acceptable levels (around 1 minute per video)
GPU resources are properly utilized without CPU bottlenecks
Model configuration settings are optimized for performance
System continues to function despite the warning message

initial_question.title: About training detail
initial_question.body:
Hi, thanks for sharing the great project.

I have found the mmdit in your method can accept different stages as input, and different stage are concatenated in token dimension. This may require the timestep to be same in different stages but different stages have their respective timestep interval. I wonder if the training sampled for each batch only include one stage, or my understanding is wrong in something. Looking forward for your reply, and thanks again for the excellent project!

satisfaction_conditions: Training batches must support multiple stages simultaneously
Stage distribution in batches must be controlled and defined

initial_question.title: text encoder network details?
initial_question.body:
I noticed that in your code, for the text encoder part, you used the clip and T5 models. Based on this, I have two questions: 1. Will the clip and T5 models update parameters during training? 2. What is the difference between these two clip models?
Looking forward to your answer, thank you

satisfaction_conditions: Model parameter update behavior must be clearly defined for each component
The distinct roles of the two CLIP models must be explained
Training state of all major components (CLIP, T5, VAE, MM-DiT) must be specified
Origin/source of each model component must be identified
VAE architecture details must be accurately described

initial_question.title: Can you fix the demo huggingface please?
initial_question.body: the question is solved thanks for replying! not sure how to delete the issue im sorry

satisfaction_conditions: User has control over frame rate settings
Frame generation stays within platform resource limits
